com.tiemens.secretshare.engine

Class SecretShare.PublicInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tiemens.secretshare.engine.SecretShare.PublicInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    SecretShare

    public static class SecretShare.PublicInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all the "publicly available" information about a secret share. Holds both "required" and "optional" information.
